variable.name: polish.Animation.MaxIdleTime
variable.description: Interval in milliseconds until animations are stopped when there is no activity. This defaults to 3 minutes.

variable.name: polish.Browser.MaxRedirects
variable.description: Maximum number of supported redirections before giving up.

variable.name: polish.Browser.MemorySaver
variable.description: Enables that a certain memory remains free at any time during loading of webpages.

variable.name: polish.Browser.MemorySaver.Amount
variable.description: The amount of memory which should be kept free at any stage during loading of webpages. This defaults to 50kb.

variable.name: polish.Browser.PaintDownloadIndicator
variable.description: Draws an indicator while the browser is downloading a page.

variable.name: polish.Browser.UserAgent
variable.description: The user agent that should be used.

variable.name: polish.CalendarItem.FirstDayOfWeek
variable.description: The first day of the week.

variable.name: polish.ChoiceGroup.handleDefaultCommandFirst
variable.description: Triggers the default command of a ChoiceGroup instead of changing the selected state of that choice.

variable.name: polish.ChoiceGroup.suppressMarkCommands
variable.description: Deactivates the Mark and Unmark commands that are added by default for a multiple ChoiceGroup.

variable.name: polish.ChoiceGroup.suppressSelectCommand
variable.description: Deactivates the Select command for a implicit or exclusive ChoiceGroup.

variable.name: polish.Container.ScrollDelta
variable.description: The difference that the Container contents should be scrolled when there is no selectable element below/above the currently focused one. This defaults to half of the available scrolling height.

variable.name: polish.Container.allowCycling
variable.description: Allows the user to traverse to the first item when being at the last one and going downwards (or to the last item when being at the first item and going upwards).
variable.appliesTo: MIDP2LayoutView, CommandItem, FakeContainerCustomItem, MenuBar, FramedForm, ChoiceTextField, UiAccess, ContainerView, TabbedForm, RelativeLayoutView, Container

variable.name: polish.Container.clearResetsFocus
variable.description: When a Container is emptied, its auto-focus index will be reset to 0 by default. Use this variable to keep the auto-focus index at the currently selected one.

variable.name: polish.Container.dontUseNumberKeys
variable.description: By default the user can select entries within a ChoiceGroup by pressing the corresponding number (e.g. '3' for selecting the third entry).

variable.name: polish.Container.notifyFocusChange
variable.description: You can activate ItemStateChangeListener updates when the user traverses to a different item within a Container.

variable.name: polish.DateField.useDirectInput
variable.description: You can activate the direct input mode for DateFields. By default a native Form with an embedded native DateField will be used.

variable.name: polish.predictive.download.message
variable.default: The predictive dictionary could not be found or has the wrong version. Press OK to exit the application and download the dictionary.

variable.name: polish.predictive.local.message
variable.default: The predictive dictionary has the wrong version or could not be found. Press OK to install the dictionary.

variable.name: polish.predictive.setup.cancel
variable.default: Do you really want to cancel the installation ? This may result in unwanted effects.

variable.name: polish.predictive.setup.info
variable.default: Installing the dictionary used for predictive input. Please wait a moment ...
